H0.text: Bishop Abel Muzorewa who died in April was a leading figure in the politics of which African country. South Africa

H1.text: Bishop Abel Muzorewa who died in April was a leading figure in the politics of which African country. Nigeria

H2.text: Bishop Abel Muzorewa who died in April was a leading figure in the politics of which African country. Egypt

H3.text: Bishop Abel Muzorewa who died in April was a leading figure in the politics of which African country. ZWE

A4.text: Abel Muzorewa served as the first and only Prime Minister of Zimbabwe Rhodesia from 1979.

A5.text: Muzorewa played a key role in Zimbabwe's transition to independence.
